category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_mds_part_send_unique_attrib_maps_to
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the attribute of the type "IMDS_msd_part_object_name", which is to be used to map the unique attribute supplied in the International Material Data System (IMDS) files. The default value is item_id.
